function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Deployment of energy-intensive technologies","Impact":"Increased environmental impact and potential for resource depletion","Mitigation":"Investing in sustainable and renewable energy technologies and reducing energy consumption","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy-efficient systems, and sustainable building design","People":"General population, ecosystems","Owner":"Governments, industry, and individuals"},{"Description":"Dissemination of design and development practices","Impact":"Potential for unsustainable development and resource exploitation","Mitigation":"Promoting sustainable and regenerative design practices, encouraging green building certifications, and fostering awareness of sustainable development principles","Technologies":"LEED certification, green building practices, and sustainable design tools","People":"Architects, developers, and building owners","Owner":"USGBC, Regenesis, and sustainability organizations"}]}
